description:
Bible Path is a thoughtfully designed app aimed at enriching your spiritual journey with scriptures that offer guidance and holy inspiration. Whether you seek daily inspiration, devotional reflections, or a deeper understanding of the scriptures, Bible Path provides a serene and supportive environment for personal growth.

Key Features:

Bible Chat:
Engage in conversations about faith, prayers, and scriptures with Bible Chat. This feature allows you to explore different interpretations of the scripture, ask questions, and connect with a community of fellow seekers in a holy atmosphere. The chat interface makes it easy to share your thoughts on scriptures and devotional topics with others.

Audio Bible:
Immerse yourself in the holy scriptures through our audio Bible. Perfect for quiet moments of reflection or during daily activities, the narrated scriptures help you stay connected to the Word of God. Whether you’re listening to audio prayers or meditating on the scripture, the app makes it easy to integrate devotional practices into your routine.

Inspirational Verses and Prayers:
Receive a daily dose of inspiration with verses and prayers that uplift and guide you. Each scripture verse and prayer is carefully chosen to offer spiritual nourishment, guiding you in your devotional journey with the holy scriptures.

Personalized Daily Reflections:
Reflect on personalized insights based on the holy scriptures and prayers that resonate with your spiritual needs. These reflections are crafted to help you ponder biblical themes and integrate their teachings into your daily life through consistent devotional practices.

Interactive Bible Studies:
Deepen your understanding of the Bible with our interactive study guides. These resources provide comprehensive insights and context, suitable for both personal study and group discussion, focusing on the holy scriptures to enrich your devotional life.

Faith Building Exercises and Prayers:
Engage in exercises designed to strengthen your faith and understanding, complemented by powerful prayers. These activities encourage you to reflect on scriptures and apply them to your life, guiding you in devotional practices.

Studies and Resources:
Access a wide range of study materials and resources tailored to different levels of biblical knowledge. Whether you are just beginning your journey or seeking advanced understanding of the scriptures, Bible Path provides a supportive resource filled with devotional insights and reflections on the holy scriptures.

Why Choose Bible Path?
Bible Path is a spiritual companion, offering a calm and nurturing space for exploring the scriptures and growing in faith. With tools like chat, audio resources, and study guides, the app is designed to be a gentle guide, helping you find clarity, comfort, and deeper meaning in your spiritual journey.

Download Bible Path and begin a journey of reflection, learning, and spiritual growth. Let this app be a quiet support in your daily life, offering holy guidance and wisdom from the scriptures through prayers, verses, and more.

Privacy Policy: https://static.holy-bible.app/:privacy-en.html

Consultez plusieurs dictionnaires Français et un dictionnaire de synonymes, tous issus des sources les plus fiables. Plus mode hors ligne.

* + de 105 000 définitions en Français.

* + de 88 000 mots disponibles dans le dictionnaire hors ligne.

* Voir les conjugaisons des verbes.

* Entendre la prononciation des mots.

* Créer un nombre illimité de favoris.

* Options de recherche avancée.

* Partagez vos mots favoris sur les réseaux sociaux, par e-mail ou texto.

À propos de Farlex

Comment faisons-nous ?
Farlex est un leader des ressources de référence en ligne. Nous travaillons avec les meilleurs éditeurs pour rassembler des contenus de confiance dans les applis les plus complètes et les plus respectées comme références sur le marché. Notre appli principale est The Free Dictionary (TFD), alimentée par TheFreeDictionary.com.

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Quran 360 is a comprehensive Al Quran app that offers a complete Quranic experience in the palm of your hand.

With features like
- Tarteel Mistake Detection (NEW)
- The Quran Teacher
- reading the Quran with Tajweed,
- word-by-word tafsir and translation (Quran English),
- listening to famous reciters (Quran Audio),
- creating Quran playlists,
- bookmarking and searching,
- Quran offline mode, and more,
equips you to learn, comprehend, recite, and memorize the Al Quran with ease. Whether you’re a beginner or an advanced learner of the Holy Quran, this app is perfect for you.

Perfect your Quranic Recitation with Tarteel Mistake Detection (NEW)

Our newly introduced Tarteel Mistake Detection feature acts as your personal Quran teacher, alerting you instantly to any missed or incorrect words in your recitation. This powerful tool helps you learn the correct recitation precisely, enhancing your Quranic study and practice.

Your Quran Teacher

With the Quran Teacher, you can ask anything about the Quran and Islam and get answers tailored to your needs, in seconds. This is a great way to strengthen your knowledge and understanding of the Quran and Islam.

Read Al Quran with Tajweed & Offline

Quran 360 is getting ready to take its place in the stores to eliminate difficulties such as the inability to adjust the font sizes, eye-catching designs, and other details that negatively affect the reading experience. It promises a more fluid reading experience.

If you learn the Holy Quran with Tajweed, you will be able to pronounce the Quranic verses correctly, reciting them in Tarteel and your recitation will sound more beautiful.

With Quran 360 app, you will always be able to read Allah's words without making any mistakes. Enjoy the serene recitations and enlightening insights of the Holy Quran even without an internet connection.

Al Quran Audio Mode with Famous Reciters

The most famous aspect of Quran 360’s listening feature is that it includes different reciters. You can listen to every ayah you want from the voices of famous reciters in Quran 360.

You can listen to surahs with recordings of well-known reciters such as Akram Al-Alaqmi (Gapless), Abdul Rashid Sufi, Abdul Muhsin al Qasim, Abdullah Mahrood, and more.

Memorize Quran Fast and Easily

With the ability to enhance the reading speed of the Holy Quran, you have the opportunity to recite the complete book swiftly. This feature proves valuable whether you wish to bypass memorized verses.

The Search in Al Quran Kareem functionality empowers efficient Quran memorization through its user-friendly strategy, effectively recognizing analogous verses (Mutashābihāt) for rapid comprehension.

Bookmarks and Playlists

It is very easy to bookmark surahs, verses, and Tilawat e Quran Kareem wherever you like.

With our playlist feature, you can listen to beautiful Quran playlists directly from the home page and create your own playlist.

Quran Tafsir - Guided Interpretations

Tafsir books demonstrate the real meanings and other details of the Ayah when they are read together with the Quran. You can see why that verse was revealed or after which event it was conveyed to the Prophet Muhammad (SAW).

Use Quran 360 to read different tafsirs and gain a deeper understanding.

Verified Al Quran Translations -  Quran English, قران كريم, Coran, Koran, Al Quran Bangla

It contains 40+ Al Quran Kareem translations, transliterations, and tafsir/commentary.

The application includes translations of many languages ​​such as English, Turkish, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Arabic, Malay, Indonesian, Hindi, Urdu, Bangla, Persian, Bulgarian, Swedish, Italian, and more.

This application is a complete french language dictionary, easy to use and fast. It is the needed tool for people learning or wanting to improve their french.

-   A rich datable of more than 50 000 words.

-   For every word, a precise definition is presented.

-   Words can be searched with results updating in real time

-   This application is only 6Mo. It will be downloaded on your iPhone/iPod quickly.

-   No internet connection needed (offline dictionary)

Build a stronger connection with your Deen, one day at a time.

Staying consistent with prayer. Making time to read even one verse a day. Remembering to say Alhamdulillah when life gets heavy. These are the habits that build Iman, and Muslim Pro is here to help you build them.

Whether you’re navigating faith at college, raising a family, or rediscovering prayer, Muslim Pro walks with you, every day, in every season of your Iman.

Designed to help you grow in faith:
- Prayer reminders (Athan) tailored to your location, helping you never miss a Salah
- Daily Quran goals to keep you reading and reflecting
- Track your progress with streaks, reminders, and reflections
- Guided Duas & Azkar, chosen for real-life moments
- Personalised Islamic content that fits your journey, your pace
- Discover halal spots & mosques nearby, even while travelling.
- Learn through short videos, articles & tips, no pressure, just progress

The Complete Qur’an Experience
- All 114 Surahs with audio recitations by renowned Qaris like Mishari Alafasy and Abdul Basit
- Word-by-word translations in English and other languages
- Tajweed color guides and recitation tips to improve your fluency
- Last read verse bookmarks & Ayah highlights
- Memorization mode with repetition, verse selection, and audio speed control
- Light & dark modes, font size adjustments for easier reading
- Verse, Surah, or keyword search
- Authentic Arabic script with Uthmani calligraphy
- Short Tafsir to help reflect on meaning
- Daily Ayah reminders to stay spiritually connected

Small steps lead to lasting change. Muslim Pro helps you stay motivated, feel accountable, and keep growing in your faith, day by day.

Exclusive Tools: Access offline reading, audio recitations, customizable prayer widgets, and interactive lessons.

Quran Majeed is an amazing Quran app that beautifies your life with the blessing of reading and listening to the Quran on the go. The latest version of the authentic Quran Majeed app for iPhone and iPad offers complete Quran in the elegant Uthmanic script, audio recitation, translations and English Tafsir Uthmani, proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim).
القرآن المجيد هو تطبيق مميز للقرآن الذي يجمل حياتك ببركة القراءة والاستماع إلى القرآن أثناء التنقل. الإصدار الأخير من تطبيق القرآن المجيد لأجهزة الآي فون والآيباد تقدم قرآنًا كاملاً في الكتابة العثمانية الأنيقة، وتلاوة الصوت، والترجمات، والتفاسير، وقام بمراجعته أحد العلماء

● Worldwide Prayer Times clock with Azan/Adhan alarm options. Supports different prayer time calculation methods. Qibla direction. Ramadan Sehar/Iftar times
أوقات الصلاة لجميع أنحاء العالم مع خيار تنبيه الأذان، ودعم طرق مختلفة لحساب أوقات الصلاة، وبوصلة القبلة، وأوقات السحور والإفطار

● World famous reciters (Sheikh Abdul Basit, Sheikh As Sudays & As Shraym, Mishari Rashid, Saad Al Ghamdi, Abu Bakr Shatry, Sheikh Ahmed Ajmi, Sheikh Al-Huzaifi, Sheikh Mahir-al-Muayqali, Sheikh Minshawi, Sheikh Ayub, Khalil Husari, Mahmood AlBana, Salah Bukhatir & Sheikh Basfar).
تلاوات القراء المعروفون عالميا.

● Four English translations (Pickthal, Dr. Mohsin, Mahmood & Yusuf Ali) and forty-five language translations (AlBanian, Amazigh, Amharic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Divehi, Dutch, French, German, Hausa, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malayalam, Malaysian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Sindhi, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tartar, Turkish, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek). 

● Option to display any translation along with full Arabic text in hi-resolution, Retina graphics in both portrait and landscape viewing. Supports pinch/zoom feature for changing font size.
خيار عرض أي ترجمة مع النص العربي الكامل بالدقة الممتازة في وضعي الأفقي والعمودي، دعم ميزة التصغير / التكبير لتغيير حجم الخط.

● Islamic greeting messages (Eid Mubarak, Ramadan Kareem, ...)
رسائل معايدة إسلامية (عيد مبارك، رمضان كريم، ...)

● Qibla Direction — اتجاه القبلة

● Hijri Converter — تحويل التاريخ

● Quran TV feature with beautiful background videos
تلفزيون القرآن مع مقاطع فيديو خلفية جميلة

● Visual Quran feature with flip gesture
المصحف المرئي مع إيماءة التقليب

● Watch live coverage of Makkah & Madinah.
شاهد التغطية المباشرة لمكة المكرمة والمدينة المنورة.

● Selectable themes (Green, Blue, Classic-Green, Night Mode, Light & Brown).
إمكانية اختيار الثيمات (أخضر، أزرق، الوضع الليلي، فاتح، بني)

● Advanced audio options to help with memorization (repetition of ayah, Surah, number of repetitions, interval, and recitation speed).
خيارات الصوت المتقدمة للمساعدة في الحفظ (تكرار الآية، وسورة، وعدد من حالات التكرار، وفاصل، وسرعة التلاوة).

● Highly advanced “Search” feature that can help with searching any word (search exact word, affixes or all roots) in the Arabic text, any of the translations and English Tafsir.
ميزة بحث متقدم يساعد في البحث عن أي كلمة ( الكلمة بالضبط، كل اللاحقات أو الجذور) في النص العربي، والترجمات والتفاسير

● Bookmarking of Aya, translation and tafsir (supports iCloud synchronization that helps your bookmarks stay up to date on all your iOS devices).
وضع علامة مرجعية على الأية، والترجمة، والتفسير للرجوع إليها

● Quranic Aya and word highlighting during recitation.
تظليل الآية والكلمة أثناء التلاوة

● Social media sharing. Ability to share selected aya via email, twitter & Facebook.

Discover the power of language with Translate AI – your trusted companion for breaking language barriers while traveling, working, or learning.
Powered by advanced artificial intelligence, Translate AI delivers fast, accurate, and natural translations for text, voice, and images.

Exceptional Features for Global Communication

Text Translation
Instantly translate written words into multiple languages with high accuracy.
Whether you're a traveler trying to understand signs, a student learning a new language, or a professional communicating internationally, Translate AI is your reliable translation tool.

Voice Translation
Enjoy real-time, natural conversations without interruptions.
Perfect for international meetings, travel, or casual chats with people around the world.

Image Translation
Simply point your camera at signs, menus, or documents to get instant and precise translations directly on your screen.

Keyboard Translation
Seamlessly integrate translation into your daily typing.
Type in one language and get an instant translation in another — ideal for messages, chats, and emails.

Why Choose Translate AI

Multimodal Translation
Text, voice, or image — Translate AI adapts to any translation need.
Unmatched Accuracy
Our state-of-the-art AI understands context to provide natural, meaningful translations — not just word-for-word results.

Elegant and Easy-to-Use Design
A clean, modern interface makes switching between languages and translation modes effortless.

Continuous Updates
We’re constantly improving, adding new features and expanding our language database to give you the most comprehensive translation experience possible.
Translate AI is more than just an app — it’s a bridge that connects you to the world.

Download now and experience smart translation today!

Supported Languages
Enjoy translations across a wide range of languages, including Afrikaans, Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and many more.

- Real-time camera translation: point your camera at text to instantly translate what you see
- Photo translation: translate text in taken or imported photos
- Dictation: translate what you speak out loud
- Text to speech: hear your translated text read out loud
- File translation: translate text from files
- Quick detection: translations begin as you type
- Alternative translations: explore different options for single words and short phrases
- Favorites: save words and phrases for future reference
- History: easily find, edit, and reuse past translations
- Transliteration: read translations of non-Latin languages, such as Japanese or Russian, in the Latin alphabet
- Glossary: translate key words and phrases as defined by you or your organization (available with a paid plan)

Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Traduisez des mots et des expressions courantes du français à l'allemand OU de l'allemand au français ! Le dictionnaire bilingue français-allemand de Farlex vous fournit instantanément des traductions avec recherche vocale ou texte, plus l'accès à la prononciation audio, des définitions, des exemples de phrases et bien plus encore !

* Tapez le mot recherché ou utilisez la fonctionnalité native de recherche vocale et prononcez simplement le mot que vous souhaitez traduire.

* Traduction hors ligne ! Accédez à des traductions mot à mot sans internet.

* Écoutez la prononciation de mots, d'expressions courantes et de questions (mode en ligne uniquement). 

* Pour prononcer comme si c'était votre langue maternelle !

* Trouvez le mot juste. Lisez les définitions et les exemples de phrases pour choisir la meilleure traduction.

* Sauvegardez un nombre illimité de favoris pour accéder rapidement à tous vos mots enregistrés.

* Passez du mode traduction français-allemand au mode allemand-français en un seul geste.

* Options de recherche avancée.

* Partagez vos mots favoris sur les réseaux sociaux, par e-mail ou texto.

* Facile d'utilisation ! Idéal en voyage ou pour apprendre une nouvelle langue.

À propos de Farlex

Comment faisons-nous ?
Farlex est un leader des ressources de référence en ligne. Nous travaillons avec les meilleurs éditeurs pour rassembler des contenus de confiance dans les applis les plus complètes et les plus respectées comme références sur le marché. Notre appli principale est The Free Dictionary (TFD), alimentée par TheFreeDictionary.com.

Translate Voice is a useful translation application that provides you with real-time and accurate text, voice and image translation services. Whether you are studying, working or traveling, it can break the language barrier for you and allow you to communicate with the world without any barriers.

2.AI driven: Using the latest artificial intelligence technology, our translation engine can provide natural and smooth translations, making you feel like you are communicating directly with a native speaker.

3. Privacy protection: We respect and protect your privacy. All translation content will be processed on cloud servers, and we will not collect or share any personal privacy information.

Phone Cleaner,Easy to use！Small size, many functions, download and use, learn more!
【 Photo album 】

1. Blurry pictures: Look for blurry photos in your album and delete those that are useless but take up space.
2. Oversized pictures: Some pictures actually need dozens of MB! ? Find them and delete them to give the album a little more space!
3. Screenshots of mobile phones: Now there are more and more screenshots in mobile phones, it doesn't matter if you can't delete them, find them all at once and solve them all!
4. Duplicate pictures: a picture accidentally downloaded many times, a lens accidentally shot many, delete it, leave one of the most satisfied on the line.

【 Album video 】

1. Oversized video: Suddenly running out of storage space on your phone? Do you have a lot of movies stored? One delete done!
2. Duplicate videos: I take a lot of videos of my family, but many of them are the same, it's okay, delete them.
3. Bad video: Many videos downloaded can not play? The original is damaged, delete and re-download!


【 Privacy Album 】
Encrypt albums, save pictures, do not upload to the cloud space, save applications locally, and delete applications with caution
